Reason: The _journalAgeThreshold configuration is performance-sensitive because it directly impacts the performance of the system at the system level. The configuration is used as a parameter when creating a PersistentJournal object in the journal() method, which is a critical operation in the system. The threshold set by _journalAgeThreshold affects the age of journal entries, which can significantly impact the execution time and memory consumption of the system. Therefore, any changes to this configuration can lead to notable performance variations at the system level.
